name: Motorcycle Bike Driving Games
description: Tristan (Aged 38) - A bike racing and alteration enthusiast lost his one leg in an accident. Now, his passion for bikes never died but have dimmed over time. His stepbrother (Ralph) is back from France and wants him to start making new bikes for him. As Tris, himself cannot make new bikes, he decided to teach Ralph and his girlfriend Amy. Ralph doesnot even know how to ride a motorbike. So, Tris gifted him his old bike to ride and the first thing he should know is, RULES to ride on the road.
